title: Is This Our Alamo Moment? | Guests: John Solomon & James Lindsay | 4/6/22
description:
Glenn discusses the digital ghetto that we are currently in as the attack on free speech from social media outlets is worsening, showing how important BlazeTV and its subscribers are. Journalist and CEO of Just the News John Solomon joins to discuss his coverage in Ukraine and the smear campaign against him at The Hill. Senior editor at TheBlaze Daniel Horowitz joins to discuss his article "Hunter Biden's role in Ukrainian biolabs raises serious questions about gain of function and Ukraine policy." Author and founder of New Discourses James Lindsay joins to expose the grooming that’s occurring in our public schools. Glenn and Stu discuss the ongoing woke-ification of Disney and the indoctrination of colleges.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
